meanings.definition: Not conforming to Jewish dietary laws.
meanings.sent1: The nonkoshers food at the party made some guests uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't eat the nonkoshers meal because it contained forbidden ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The nonkoshers dish looked so out of place among the traditional foods.
meanings.sent4: The nonkoshers ingredients in the soup added a strange twist to the flavor.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the nonkoshers meat lingered in the kitchen for hours.

meanings.definition: Not acceptable or appropriate according to Jewish dietary laws.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant had to remove the nonkoshers items from the menu.
meanings.sent2: He accidentally bought nonkoshers products and had to return them.
meanings.sent3: The nonkoshers snacks were quickly replaced with kosher options.
meanings.sent4: Her grandmother always made sure the kitchen was free of nonkoshers foods.
meanings.sent5: The nonkoshers label on the package surprised many customers.
